casebody.data:
MOUNTAIN VILLAGES, LLC, Melba Richards, Manager and Lori Richards, Owner
v.
Zara Ellis SADLER. No. 204P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Zara Ellis Sadler, for Sadler, Zara Ellis. Mountain Villages, for Mountain Villages, LLC. Lori Richards, for Mountain Villages, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd of June 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd of June 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th of July 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th of July 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Jackson County District Court, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
